channel.title: TrisidiaX Updateing
channel.description:
So i got TrisidiaX and i notice the player combat lvl does not update untill you logout how would i make it so u dont have to logout to see the new combat lvl
Thanks for help in advance

item.title: TrisidiaX Updateing
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“PvPXile, post:4, topic:477092”][quote author=kill boy 98 link=topic=595285.msg4191618#msg4191618 date=1356893108]
Ok i was looking at this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537306.140.html but the link is dead and i saw i commented and was wondering would u uplode it and give me the link if u have it Thanks
[/quote]

What the love are you doing, you’re a senior member.[/quote]
That means nothing about experience. It is just about posting a lot or not.

OT: If you want it to update whenever you level up, just put it under the initialize method in Client.java.

Read full topic
